name: She is helmet
description:
Gameplay: Hero needs to fight with monsters, surpassing him in strength many times. It’s easy to kill a hero, but he has an ability that, after death, takes him back in time, and he, along with his clone, tries to pass this level, and the clone repeats all the actions that the player did last time. If the hero dies again, he, and already his two clones, pass the level, then three clones, four, etc. .. By the idea you fill the space with clones and create an army for victory! 😊 And the hero is a little girl in a huge helmet!😃😃😃

Control:

[W] [A] [S] [D] - Movemen

Arrows key [^] [<] [v] [>] - Attack

Space [ - ] - Dash
